description: The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above. The Level of Security Requirement is Top Secret.
duration_in_months: There is no end date for the contact
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
full_summary:
\###Temporary Help Services Requirement

####Notice

The Department of National Defense (DND) has published a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the CPSS program for Temporary Help Services. 

**Offering Entity**: The RFP is open to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who have been qualified under the following streams and categories: Special Advisor.

**Invited Suppliers**: The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:
\* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
\* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
\* Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting
\* DBHS Security Consulting Inc.
\* eVision Inc. and SoftSim Technologies Inc. (Joint Venture)
\* H2 ANALYTICS INC.
\* HubSpoke Inc.
\* Maverin Inc.
\* Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
\* RHEA INC.
\* S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
\* TAG HR The Associates Group Inc.
\* TRM Technologies Inc.
\* Turtle Island Staffing Inc.
\* Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

**Background**:

The DND has issued an RFP for Temporary Help Services according to the CPSS program.

**Description of Requirement**:

The DND requires the services of a temporary help service provider with the following level of security clearance: Top Secret.

**Requirements**:

\* Niveau de sécurité niveau: Très secret
\* Description requirement: Le DND a besoin des services d'aide temporaire.



** Tender Submission Details**:


\* Closing Date: 2023-10-05
\* RFP document reference: [Insert reference]
\* Security Classification: Top Secret.

---
